spawn_direction_count.description: Number of different spawn directions the encounters come from

first_wave_delay.description: Time before the first wave comes

min_wave_length.description: Minimum amount of time that must pass before checking for a completing wave - to make sure wave spawns in first

encounter_point_start.description: What's the multiplier initially at during horde mode?

encounter_point_end.description: At what level does the encounter points stop?

enemies_remaining_wave_trigger.description: Max number of enemies before allowing quick next wave trigger
